snippet: The geographic terrain of the 2012 presidential campaign will narrow on Thursday to a 250-mile stretch between Cleveland and Cincinnati, two cities that will hold dueling events by President Obama and Mitt Romney.
abstract: The geographic terrain of the 2012 presidential campaign will narrow on Thursday to a 250-mile stretch between Cleveland and Cincinnati, two cities that will hold dueling events by President Obama and Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Obama and Romney Campaigns Face Off in Ohio
